name: Our Mission
about: At DogCoPedia, it is our mission to provide you with a wide range of images and resources to get to know the dog breed of your choosing
description: With the use of effective and fast APIs, we are committed to delivery images and vital information about your desired breed of dogs

name: Our Values
about: At DogCoPedia, we value honesty, transparency, diligency and helping even people with disabilities get to use technology and find the dog breed suitable for them
description: it is our sole purpose to create platforms through transparency and diligence that will be accessible to users with disabilities as also normal users. We will do this by leveraging on some effective web accessibility principles
